string-array.name: data_highlight_product
string-array.item: The AERONAUT 6000D badminton racket is built on the Aeronaut Technology Platform that has a unique air-stream channel integrated into the racket head. This reduces air resistance which helps to generate faster shuttlecock speeds. It’s suitable for players looking for the best control with little to no sacrifice in power.

The Li-Ning 3D Calibar X Combat badminton uses the 3D Calibar Technology and features a high-tech geometric frame design that greatly reduces air resistance. It provides you with higher swing speeds for stronger smashes and best-suits players who rely on peak power in their gameplay. The racket has been engineered to perfection by devising TB Nano, Aerotec Beam System, MPCF Reinforcing technologies. This is a COMBAT Series racket featuring a heavier head and higher balance point. It is a perfect match for players who swear by their aggressive gameplay and want absolute power domination.

The Li-Ning Mega Power is a gun racket for all badminton lovers. Engineered with a Smash Power Frame and High Tech Slim Shaft, this racket improves your hitting velocity considerably and balances the rebound and anti-torsion performance. This is a head-heavy racket with a bigger sweet spot to enable you to smash and defend seamlessly.

When you think of lightweight rackets, the Li-Ning Windstorm 72S is the stellar winner. Windstorm technology delivers an ultalite 72g racket frame giving you optimised speed and control. The racket also features a head-heavy balance with the frame weight more concentrated towards the racket head to enhance your swing power. The flexible shaft offers faster swing speeds to improve your reaction time significantly and make you unstoppable on the court.

The Li-Ning AXFORCE 20 is a prime attackers racket made for those who love to flex their weapon like a chief warrior in full swing. This ballistic racket has a head-heavy profile and dons a 6.8mm soft flexible shaft. The racket is further enhanced for peak performance with the technical features of Li-Ning technologies of Box Wing Frame, Sonic Boom System and High Carbon Material technology. This racket is the perfect comrade for players who are a big fan of smashing and who often fire attacks from the rear court.

The Li-Ning Tectonic 1S is crafted for the ultimate swift strokes with technology devised for strength and stability. Discover a supreme combat weapon for bold attacks and raging defences. The 7mm soft flexible shaft gives you the elastic ability to retain shape and control at every strike for ultra movement precision.

The Windstorm 72 badminton racket is part of the Extra Skill Series and is a LIGHTWEIGHT racket for players with FAST RACKET SPEED and QUICK HANDS. Dynamic Optimum Frame is a high-tech badminton racket frame technology that delivers exceptional offensive and defensive play characteristics and includes an enlarged sweet spot for high repulsion performance.

The Li-Ning Tectonic 3R is the Rex speed series badminton racket. This relentless rager features a flexible frame that absorbs potential rebound energy and doubles acceleration power. With its Wing stabilizer Technology and TB Nano carbon fibre frame, the overall strength, stability and striking precision are improved while simultaneously suppressing turbulence.

Elevate your performance on the court with the supremely engineered super carbon racket AxForce 60. Its Box Wing frame reduces air drag and boosts power for more efficient strikes. The ultra-slim 6.8mm soft flexible shaft aids in better defense and precise shots. Li-Ning Wing Stabilizer System improves motion stability and helps with a quick, exact, and stable second stroke.

Introducing the LI-NING AXFORCE 70 badminton racquet - a perfect blend of power and precision. Designed in sleek black and silver, this racquet is visually stunning and engineered for top performance. Experience unrivalled control and accuracy on the court with the AXFORCE 70s advanced technology
